meanings.definition: To have the same opinion or come to a mutual understanding.
meanings.sent1: We all agreed on the best movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: They agreed to meet at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The cats agreed to share the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: The colors in the painting agreed with each other perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces agreed together to reveal a beautiful picture.

meanings.sent4: The sun agreed to shine brightly on the special day.
meanings.sent5: The river agreed to carry the boat gently downstream.
